short_summary: X-Ray Fluorescence (XRF) analyzer to be supplied to Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), CanmetMINING
description: This tender is to source an XRF analyzer. The analyzer is expected to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario by March 22, 2024. The procurement is open and competitive.
duration_in_months: This contract will last for approximately 12 months, from the date of award to the date of delivery and acceptance. The delivery and acceptance period is expected to take approximately 9 months. The total duration of the contract is expected to be approximately 21 months.
